title: Support local-only mode without remote sync
description:
Add support for local-only bookmark storage without requiring GitHub authentication or remote repository. This would allow users to use WebTags purely for local bookmark organization with tags, without the sync feature.

## Requirements
- Allow extension to work without initializing a GitHub repository
- Store bookmarks.json locally in browser storage or local filesystem
- Provide UI to toggle between local-only and sync modes
- All tagging and bookmark management features should work in local mode
- Optional: Allow upgrading from local-only to sync mode later

## Benefits
- Lower barrier to entry for new users
- Useful for users who don't want/need GitHub sync
- Allows testing extension without GitHub setup
- Privacy-focused option for users who prefer local-only storage
